description: The project involved improving scalability by separating an EC2 instance running an application and two databases (Milvus and Supabase), and implementing auto-scaling for the application.

technologies_used.name: AWS EC2
technologies_used.description: Cloud service used to host and scale the application and databases.
technologies_used.infrastructure: EC2 instances were configured to host and scale the application and databases.
steps: Launch EC2 instances for application and database hosting.
Configure security groups and network settings for instances.
Set up scaling policies to ensure proper scaling of resources based on demand.

technologies_used.name: VPC & Subnets
technologies_used.description: Network configuration tools to ensure secure communication between EC2 instances.
technologies_used.infrastructure: Private subnets were used for enhanced security.
steps: Create a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) with public and private subnets.
Set up routing and security controls for private subnets.
Configure network access between EC2 instances while maintaining security.

technologies_used.name: AWS ALB
technologies_used.description: Application Load Balancer used to route traffic to different EC2 instances based on path and service type.
technologies_used.infrastructure: ALB was deployed to route incoming traffic efficiently.
steps: Set up ALB with target groups for application and database services.
Configure path-based routing for directing traffic to specific instances.
Monitor ALB metrics to ensure optimal traffic distribution.

technologies_used.name: Docker & Docker Compose
technologies_used.description: Used for containerizing the application and databases, allowing easy deployment across instances.
technologies_used.infrastructure: Docker containers were deployed across EC2 instances.
steps: Create Docker images for the application and databases.
Write Docker Compose configuration for multi-container management.
Deploy containers on EC2 instances and manage their lifecycle.

technologies_used.name: Auto-Scaling
technologies_used.description: Feature that automatically adjusts the number of EC2 instances for the application based on traffic.
technologies_used.infrastructure: Auto-scaling was set up to dynamically adjust EC2 instance count based on load.
steps: Define auto-scaling policies based on traffic demand.
Set up CloudWatch alarms for monitoring performance.
Configure scaling actions to automatically add or remove instances.

infrastructure.name: EC2 Instances
infrastructure.description: Used to host both the application and databases in separate instances.

infrastructure.name: Private Subnets
infrastructure.description: Created private subnets to improve security by isolating EC2 instances.

infrastructure.name: Application Load Balancer
infrastructure.description: Used to distribute incoming traffic between different services based on routing configurations.
steps: Set up ALB with target groups for application and database services.
Configure path-based routing for specific traffic routing.

skills_required.name: AWS EC2
skills_required.description: Experience with launching, configuring, and managing EC2 instances for application and database hosting.

skills_required.name: VPC & Subnets
skills_required.description: Proficiency in configuring VPCs, subnets (public/private), and routing for secure network communications.

skills_required.name: AWS ALB
skills_required.description: Experience in setting up and configuring AWS Application Load Balancers, including target groups and traffic routing.

skills_required.name: Docker & Docker Compose
skills_required.description: Strong skills in containerizing applications and databases using Docker and orchestrating them with Docker Compose.

skills_required.name: Auto-Scaling
skills_required.description: Knowledge of configuring auto-scaling for EC2 instances to dynamically manage traffic loads.

skills_required.name: Database Migration
skills_required.description: Experience with database migration and management, particularly with Milvus and Supabase.

skills_required.name: Security Best Practices
skills_required.description: Understanding of security practices like using private subnets and configuring secure access with AWS ALB.

challenges_faced.name: Scalability
challenges_faced.description: Ensuring the infrastructure could scale dynamically based on traffic.

challenges_faced.name: Migration Complexity
challenges_faced.description: Successfully migrating the application and databases to separate instances without downtime.

challenges_faced.name: Security
challenges_faced.description: Securing EC2 instances by moving them to private subnets and using proper access controls.

outcomes.name: Improved Scalability
outcomes.description: Implemented auto-scaling for EC2 instances, improving the application's ability to handle varying traffic loads.

outcomes.name: Separation of Services
outcomes.description: Successfully separated the application and databases into different EC2 instances, optimizing performance and security.
